alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, southeastern Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hestertown to near Fairmont. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fairmont, Bladenboro, Fair Bluff, Boardman, Butters, Barnesville, Evergreen, Marietta, Proctorville, and Orrum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
